lines: 1. O gladsome light, Of God the Father's face, The eternal splendour wearing; Celestial, holy, blest, Our Saviour, Jesus Christ, Joyful in Thine appearing.
2. Now e'er day fadeth quite, We see the ev'ning light Our wonted hymn outpouring; Father of might unknown, Thee His incarnate Son, And Holy Spirit adoring.
3. To Thee of right belongs All praise of holy songs, O Son of God, lifegiver; Thee therefore, O most high, The world doth glorify And shall exalt forever.
